type.description:
## Enchantable

---


[Item Condition Type](https://origins.readthedocs.io/en/latest/types/item_condition_types/enchantable)

Checks if the item is enchantable.

Type ID: `origins:enchantable`

---

### Examples

```json
"item_condition": {
    "type": "origins:enchantable"
}
```
